channel.title: Scientists in Office Complex
channel.description: One thing that I thought was weird about the game was how there were people in lab coats working in the Office Complex. After all, you would have accountants and people who work with money in the office complex, not scientists... So, because I have no artistic talent, nor any idea how to do this, I call to the community to create a skin for the "scientist" model exclusively in the office complex to look more office-like, as in having a blue collared shirt with a tie. I actually have no idea whether this is possible, but could you guys try? This bugged me quite a bit in Half Life, and I was hoping it would have been addressed, but I guess not. Yeah... If you can, that's excellent, if you can't, well... Lets just focus on this, okay? PS: I know this may seem petty, but small things like these can impact the immersion of the game. Still an Awesome Awesome game though... I certainly won't deny that.

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well obviously there’d be some, but that wouldn’t be all of, or even most of what you’d find.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Han_Shot_First
item.description:
I’d thought that they’d be accountants or something. Black Mesa gotta keep track of that budget.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
Flatline:

I’ll repeat, if it wasn’t clear enough the first time, in a scientific establishment, as Black Mesa is, the majority of the people that you’ll find, even in the offices, will be SCIENTISTS.

Very good point.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Alyxx:

I guess the office floor was having the day off and the scientists were using it as a lounge area.

I’ll repeat, if it wasn’t clear enough the first time, in a scientific establishment, as Black Mesa is, the majority of the people that you’ll find, even in the offices, will be SCIENTISTS.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex

item.description:
I guess the office floor was having the day off and the scientists were using it as a lounge area.

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Han_Shot_First
item.description:
I mean, how? Pretty much everyone in the BMRF dies. Freeman seems to be the only one able to mow down the aliens and the military, and the guards even have a hard time. How do you expect office workers to successfully escape? I mean, it’s a fine theory and all, but it would certainly be nice to have some office workers lying around.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
Pfft, they evacuated themselves regardless of any official procedure, I’m sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Han_Shot_First
item.description:
Alyxx, no one was evacuated, I thought that was kind of the point of why Gordon has to fight his way through.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Utterly bemused, everyone in the offices on my floor aside from the main office is populated entirely by scientists, many of whom will leave their lab coat on when moving around. No reason to presume Black Mesa would be any different.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
Eh, considering a massive scale invasion is taking place, my fan theory is that all the office personell were evacuated from the office complex and the scientists ended up taking shelter there.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
Actually, there are dead men in office suits in On a Rail Uncut. It could be great if someone used their model to replace some scientists in Office Complex with office guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Dr_Maxwell
item.description:
I just thought I’d say that it’s shameful how negative everyone else is being here. It’s as if any improvement on Black Mesa is stepping outside our place!

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Meta:

So, I’m having a bit of trouble downloading Joint Ops. I downloaded it, and have it open, but I’m not sure where to put the files now that I have them.

Just place the files in your BMS folder.
Which should be like this:
Steam/Steamapps/Sourcemods/BMS/

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: miklkit
item.description:
Of course I did not make backups. I be only a humble end user. :pirate:

It only takes a few minutes to reinstall BMS, but backup files might help.

EDIT: This is working now. It seems that the joint ops v2 mod needs to be installed for the dark suits to appear.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
miklkit:

The ratio seems to be backwards. They are not all black suited, only almost all of them including Eli.

Sorry, I should have made clearer instructions. The ones you are meant to replace can be found in “materials\models\humans\sciencenm2”. If you haven’t made backups, then I can host the files you need.

Read full topic

item.title: Scientists in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Late bump but if you use the Joint Ops V2 pack, and put the Businessmen Scientist into the folder containing the alternate Scientist Skins. It affects roughly 10% of the Scientists, so it won’t be overdone. It’s a nice touch to have.
